div1.fw:
Cyril Clemens, Editor
Mark Twain Journal
Kirkwood 22, Missouri
div1.p: It gives us very great pleasure to inform you that you have been voted a complimentary life subscription to the Mark Twain Journal which we hope that you will much enjoy reading.

Thank you so much for sending me that fascinating book "When the Tree Flowered" which I am reading with a great deal of interest, pleasure and fascination. I have always been interested in the Sioux and your account tells me so much about them that I never knew before.
I hope you keep well these days. It was a great and real pleasure seeing you at the Dedication.
Do you ever get to St Louis? Next time you do I hope you can break bread with me and see our Mark Twain collection.
div1.closer:
Cyril Clemens
Cyril Clemens> Just heard from Robert Frost He is well
